aperk.name: Officers
aperk.info: by 1 increases the count of officers

aperk.name: Main group
aperk.info: by 2 increases the count of club members

aperk.name: Experience
aperk.info: by 1% increases the experience gained from fishing for all members of the club

aperk.name: Income
aperk.info: by 1% increases the income from the sale of fish to all club members

aperk.name: Efficiency
aperk.info: by 3% increases the club’s experience from all sources

aperk.name: College
aperk.info: by 2 increases the count of club members

aperk.name: Efficiency II
aperk.info: by 7% increases the club’s experience from all sources

aperk.name: Experience II
aperk.info: by 2% increases the experience gained from fishing for all members of the club

aperk.name: Income II
aperk.info: by 2% increases the income from the sale of fish to all club members
